Мастер фраза для определения максимально: I can fulfill your request, but there are a couple of conditio
dialogs_chapter_1_Фенрикс, Клара, Фридри:
Fenrix, Klara, Friedrich, Werner. 
Your memory will remain forever on this wall.
dialogs_chapter_1_Даже когда все в Чисти:
Even when everyone in Purgatory forgets. 
Your names will never fade away.
dialogs_chapter_1_Дождись меня, друг и т:
Wait for me, friend, and your soul 
will be freed from the shackles of Adamant's bondage.
dialogs_chapter_1_Так, как ты хочешь его: So what do you want to call it?
dialogs_chapter_1_Что-то что отражает ув: Something that reflects confidence and pride.
dialogs_chapter_1_Я придумал кое-что пол: I came up with something better. You'll soon find out.
Hello, Sidrin.\.
You have shown yourself well in battles against our 
enemies, successfully passed the promotion test.
dialogs_chapter_1_Отныне, ты Вероломгер,:
From now on, you are the Treacherer, the supreme 
reaper on whose shoulders responsibility lies for the lives 
of fellow humans and the fate of everything Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_1_Перед тем, как ты прис:
Before you begin your service\..\..\..
You can wish for whatever you want.\.
I will grant one wish.
dialogs_chapter_1_Но только, если оно не:
But only if it does not contradict our laws
and will not harm Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_1_Сидрин стал на одно ко:
Sidrin got down on one knee and bowed his head in front of
Death.
dialogs_chapter_1_Госпожа, прошу, создай:
Mistress, please create a special reaper,
with a human soul.
Who will differ from people only in body.
dialogs_chapter_1_Ты хочешь создать чело:
You want to create a man among the dead.
I can fulfill your request, but there are a couple of conditions.
dialogs_chapter_1_Первое - вы с Беллой б:
First of all, you and Bella will be obliged to raise him
appropriately.
dialogs_chapter_1_Второе - за ним буду с:
Secondly, two corps will be watching him,
scouts and punishers.
dialogs_chapter_1_Третье - если он решит:
Third, if he decides to go against my will,
I will get rid of him, and it is possible that with your hands.
dialogs_chapter_1_Я принимаю, ваши услов:
I accept your terms, madam.
He will not go against your will.
Otherwise, I will personally take care of him.
dialogs_chapter_1_Смерть коснулась кисти: Death touched the hands of Sidrin and Bella.
dialogs_chapter_1_Смерть отколола кусок: Death broke off a piece of his skin.
dialogs_chapter_1_В руках Смерти появилс: A huge luminous ball appeared in the hands of Death.
Remember this moment. This is the first time
I allowed a man to be among the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_1_Зед. Будь добр, сопров:
Zed. Kindly escort Sidrin and Bella
to the mechanism and finish what you started.
dialogs_chapter_1_Интересно вы придумали:
Interesting what you came up with. A man in the body 
of a reaper.
dialogs_chapter_1_Сидрин, ты уверен, что:
Sidrin, are you sure that he will not violate our
laws?
dialogs_chapter_1_Нет, не уверен, но даю:
No, I'm not sure, but I guarantee
that he won't cross the line.
The devil you say\..\..\.. Which one exactly?
Any act of disobedience may be the last.
dialogs_chapter_1_Черта, при которой по:
The trait at which Rickard will come for his soul\..\..\..
or me.
dialogs_chapter_1_Хочу я верить тебе, но:
I want to believe you, but knowing human
kind\..\..\.. I can only wish you good luck.
dialogs_chapter_1_Органический материал: There is organic material. There is a soul.
dialogs_chapter_1_Без паники, процесс ид: Don't panic, the process is underway! Everything is fine!
dialogs_chapter_1_Зед что-то очень быстр: Zed began to click something very quickly and nervously.
dialogs_chapter_1_Порядок, сейчас всё бу: It's okay, everything will be fine now.
dialogs_chapter_1_Твое имя Риом. Риом Ру: Your name is Riom. Riom Ruri.
Riom\..\..\.. A\..\..\.. I am a reaper. Servant of Death.
My job is to protect the souls of people and guide them
into our world.
dialogs_chapter_1_Твоя семья. Я Сидрин Р: Your family. I am Sidrin Ruri, your father.
dialogs_chapter_1_А она Белла Рури. Твоя: And she is Bella Ruri. Your mother.
dialogs_chapter_1_После долгих лет лекци:
After many years of lectures and training\..\..\..
Finally this damn exam.
dialogs_chapter_1_Всего-то нужно пройти: All you need to do is pass a combat skills test.
dialogs_chapter_1_И преодоление преград: And overcoming obstacles in non-standard ways.
dialogs_chapter_1_Для взаимодействия с о:
To interact with objects, press the key
confirmation - \C[3]Z, Space \C[0]or \C[3]Enter.
dialogs_chapter_1_Для отмены/выхода в ме:
To cancel/exit the menu - press \C[2]X, Num 0,
\C[0]or \C[2]Esc.
dialogs_chapter_1_Приветствую, Риом Рури:
Greetings, Riom Ruri!
How are you feeling, are you ready for the test?
dialogs_chapter_1_Честно говоря, многое:
To be honest, a lot of it is out of my head.
took off. Please remind.
dialogs_chapter_1_Для нанесения урона вы:
To deal damage, choose one of three types
skills: Normal attack, Skills or Magic.
dialogs_chapter_1_После выбора Атаки вам: After choosing an Attack, you need to decide where to strike.
dialogs_chapter_1_\\I[10]Удар в голову с:
\I[10]A blow to the head has a 25% chance of stunning the enemy.
\I[7]A blow to the torso weakens physical. target protection by 25%.
\I[8]A blow to the hands weakens physical. target's attack by 25%.
\I[9]Hitting the legs reduces the target's speed by 25%.
dialogs_chapter_1_Последовательность ход:
The sequence of moves depends on the “Speed” parameter,
The higher it is, the more often you can walk.
dialogs_chapter_1_Перед тем, как любой п:
Before any enemy attacks, you will see
one of three indicators.
dialogs_chapter_1_\\C[1]Магическая атака:
\C[1]Magic attack.
It cannot be counterattacked with a normal skill. From her
It is recommended to dodge using the “Dodge” skill
or block through the “Protection” skill.
dialogs_chapter_1_\\C[2]Физическая атака:
\C[2]Physical attack.
It can be returned to the enemy using the “Counterattack” skill.
dialogs_chapter_1_\\C[7]Особое умение. Э:
\C[7]Special skill.
These are enhancing skills, or combat piercing skills
“Evasion” and “Counterattack”. It is recommended not to allow
using such a skill using “stun”.
dialogs_chapter_1_Дин исцеляет Риома сли: Dean heals Rioma with a life bar.
dialogs_chapter_1_И напоследок, приемы,:
And finally, techniques that won't
You will be able to dodge or fight them off.
dialogs_chapter_1_Силён. Не ожидал, что: Strong. I didn't expect you to defeat me so easily.
dialogs_chapter_1_Может тебе медика вызв: Should I call a doctor for you?
dialogs_chapter_1_Нет. Мне нужно передох: No. I need a break. I can handle it myself.
dialogs_chapter_1_Вся дополнительная инф: All additional information is stored in notes.
dialogs_chapter_1_Время от времени там б:
From time to time there will be information about
the surrounding world, events or game mechanics.
dialogs_chapter_1_Как ты? Готов к испыта: How are you Ready for the challenge?
dialogs_chapter_1_Ага, зазубрил всё на и: Yeah, I learned everything by heart.
dialogs_chapter_1_В этой короткой симуля:
In this short simulation, you
will be tested on your ability to use ingots in battle.
dialogs_chapter_1_Первый тип слитков - в: The first type of ingots is reducing.
dialogs_chapter_1_Восстанови все показат: Restore all indicators and we can continue.
dialogs_chapter_1_Следующий тип слитков: The next type of ingots are amplifiers.
dialogs_chapter_1_На данный момент в рас:
Currently the reapers have three
amplifiers: “attack” ingot, “defense” ingot and magic
barrier.
dialogs_chapter_1_Слиток “атаки” увеличи:
Attack Ingot increases damage from
physical attacks by 50%.
dialogs_chapter_1_Слиток “защиты” снижае:
Protection ingot reduces damage from
physical damage by 50%.
dialogs_chapter_1_Магический барьер сниж:
Magic barrier reduces damage from
magical damage by 50%.
dialogs_chapter_1_Усилитель можно активи:
The amplifier can be activated as in
the battle itself, and outside, having prepared in advance.
dialogs_chapter_1_Используйте расходное:
Use consumable equipment wisely, otherwise
You may find yourself in an awkward position.
dialogs_chapter_1_Как будете готовы нача: When you are ready to start checking, go to the terminal.
dialogs_chapter_1_Вне битвы усилитель “а:
Outside of battle, the attack amplifier will help bypass physical
obstacles.
dialogs_chapter_1_Слиток “защиты” снизит:
The “protection” ingot will reduce the incoming
damage from physical threats. Like stones, a blade and stuff.
dialogs_chapter_1_Аналогично работает и:
The magic barrier works the same way.
Only protects against magical damage.
I understand, I understand\..\..\.. I went through these lessons
every now and again.
dialogs_chapter_1_Пора бы использовать с: It's time to use the protection ingot.
dialogs_chapter_1_В прошлой комнате мне:
In the last room, an attack ingot came in handy. I'm 
confident in this they prepared something new for me in 
the room\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Нет. Половину испытани: No. You passed half the test successfully.
dialogs_chapter_1_О нет\\..\\..\\.. Ты т: Oh no\..\..\.. Are you going to attack me too?
dialogs_chapter_1_Конечно. Система тебе:
Of course. The system told you about the application
ingots out of combat. It remains to be seen how
you use them in battle.
dialogs_chapter_1_Дай хотя бы дух переве:
At least let me catch my breath.
And how should I contact you?
dialogs_chapter_1_Передохни минутку и мо: Take a minute and we can get started.
dialogs_chapter_1_Решился таки\\..\\..\\: I finally decided\..\..\.. Great, let's go!
dialogs_chapter_1_Всё, хватит. С тактико: Enough. You are familiar with the tactics.
dialogs_chapter_1_Можешь приступать к сл: You can proceed to the next test.
dialogs_chapter_1_Филин вогнал меч в зем: The owl drove the sword into the ground.
dialogs_chapter_1_Страшные у этих боевых: These combat reapers have terrible tools.
dialogs_chapter_1_Надеюсь и мне когда-ни: I hope someday they will give me one too.
dialogs_chapter_1_Досадно. Давай ещё раз: It's a shame. Let's do it again from the very beginning.
dialogs_chapter_1_Мне заново это всё про: Do I have to go through this all over again?!
dialogs_chapter_1_Перед началом восполни:
Before you begin, replenish your supply of consumables and approach
to the terminal to start the simulation.
dialogs_chapter_1_Пока ты не попал в пол:
Before you come into the sight of the enemy,
He won't react at all.
dialogs_chapter_1_Тебя заметили. В данно:
You have been noticed. In this situation,
there are several options.
dialogs_chapter_1_Сразиться, или попытат:
Fight, or try to escape.
Assess the situation and decide what is best to do.
dialogs_chapter_1_Поздравляю с успешным:
Congratulations on successfully passing the test.
thinking, Riom Ruri. Go to the next room.
dialogs_chapter_1_Кенчиру? Странно видет:
Kenchiru? It's strange to see you as
instructor.
dialogs_chapter_1_Кенчиру достает гологр: Kenchiru takes out a holographic tablet.
dialogs_chapter_1_Ривальсер Кенчиру, наз:
Rivalser Kenchiru, appointed temporary
examiner Rioma Ruri. When Riom is successful
will go through three stages, Kenchiru must fight him
in full force.
dialogs_chapter_1_Критерии успешного про:
The criteria for successful completion is victory
on Rioma's part, or the fact that he was able
last long enough.
dialogs_chapter_1_Короче, биться будем п:
In short, we will fight until one of us
won't collapse on the floor. Not to death!
dialogs_chapter_1_Пока я не выдохнусь. В:
Until I'm exhausted. The order doesn't say anything
during. So I’ll decide for myself when enough is enough.
dialogs_chapter_1_Слушай\\..\\..\\.. У т: Listen\..\..\.. You seem to have\..\..\.. A special weapon.
dialogs_chapter_1_Ага. Ты его не увидишь:
Yeah. You won't see it, but here's the effect\..\..\..
You'll remember it for a long time.
dialogs_chapter_1_Ничего. С такими навык:
Nothing. With such skills you can
boldly go to the corps of combat reapers, or to us in
intelligence.
dialogs_chapter_1_Это мой вердикт как ин: This is my verdict as an instructor.
dialogs_chapter_1_Ага. Не охота ещё раз: Yeah. I don’t want to get hit in the ribs with a sword again.
No, no, no\..\..\.. That won’t work.
dialogs_chapter_1_Кенчиру исцелил Риома: Kenchiru healed Rioma with a life bar.
*Breathes heavily*\..\..\.. Perhaps we’ve both had enough.
You fight well.
The minimum requirement to pass the exam has been met.
dialogs_chapter_1_У тебя других дел нет?: Don't you have anything else to do?
dialogs_chapter_1_На сегодня больше ниче: There is nothing more left for today.
dialogs_chapter_1_Пошли в столовую, выпь: Let's go to the dining room and have an energy drink.
dialogs_chapter_1_После перекуса в столо: After having a snack in the dining room, Riom came to his room.
dialogs_chapter_1_Что-то слегка вымоталс:
A little exhausted\..\..\..
I wonder if I sometimes feel like sleeping alone?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Постели тут довольно м:
The beds here are quite soft\..\..\..
Well\..\..\..
There are no classes for the next couple of dozen hours, how
and work\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Надеюсь, для жнеца не:
I hope it won't be a sin for the reaper
take a nap for a couple of hours.
dialogs_chapter_1_Фух\\..\\..\\.. Ну и п: Phew\..\..\.. Well, I’ll dream about something like this\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Прошло около 5-и часов:
About 5 hours passed.
Irei will have a lecture soon, I’ll finish the rest there.
dialogs_chapter_1_Вы только что нашли од: You have just found one of the Reapers' equipment.
dialogs_chapter_1_Перейдите во вкладку \: Go to the Equip tab to equip \C[3]speed amplifier\C[0].
dialogs_chapter_1_Он увеличит параметр \: It will increase the character's \C[1]speed\C[0] parameter.
dialogs_chapter_1_\\C[1]Чем она выше, те: \C[1]The higher it is, the more often you can walk\C[0].
dialogs_chapter_1_Отлично\\..\\..\\.. Ху:
Excellent\..\..\.. Worse than walking in the fresh air
I've never had\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Гигантские когти напра: The giant claws were heading towards the reaper!
dialogs_chapter_1_Соскользнув с бицепса:
Slipping from the devastator's bicep, the reaper bit into
blade into the giant's belly.
dialogs_chapter_1_Падение было смертельн: The fall was fatal... even for a reaper...
dialogs_chapter_1_Лёгкие окрасились чёрн:
The lungs were stained with black blood\..\..\..
The ribs were divided into dozens of small parts\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_А почки, печень, кишки:
And the kidneys, liver, intestines and heart turned into a huge
bloody mess\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Все это началось подоб: It all started like a nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_1_Сначала всё начинается:
At first everything starts out normal.\|
You see familiar things, familiar images.
dialogs_chapter_1_На вид их не отличить:
In appearance they cannot be distinguished from reality.\|
At some point you even forget that this is a dream.
dialogs_chapter_1_Но потом происходящее:
But then what happens turns into pure, unbearable
horror.
dialogs_chapter_1_Он начинает терзать те:
He starts to torment you, torment you.
Chase you wherever you run.
dialogs_chapter_1_И единственное, что хо: And the only thing you want at this moment\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_1_Чтобы этот кошмар нако: So that this nightmare can finally end.
dialogs_chapter_1_Так и началась моя ист: This is how my story began.
dialogs_chapter_1_Я Риом Рури. \\.Низкор:
I am Riom Ruri. \.Low-ranked reaper, guide and gatherer
a soul who unquestioningly serves its creator - \!
Of death.
dialogs_chapter_1_Наша работа - защищать:
Our job is to protect human souls.\.
Make sure that the sophisticated inhabitants of the 
world of the Dead do not interfered with the life cycle of 
people. \.They did not disturb the natural order of things.
dialogs_chapter_1_Несколько сотен лет на:
Several hundred years ago, Purgatory was attacked by an enemy who
greatly underestimated. and didn't wait.
dialogs_chapter_1_Мы зовем их Восставшим:
We call them the Risen. I don't remember much about them, but I know
one thing...
dialogs_chapter_1_В день своей атаки, он: On the day of their attack, they killed a lot of people.
dialogs_chapter_1_Все жнецы, от мелких р:
All the reapers, from small workers like me to the Werolomgers,
the most senior in rank\..\..\.. Everyone suffered huge losses.
Just like the Risen themselves.
dialogs_chapter_1_Мой отец и несколько В:
My father and several of the Treachers fought the leaders
The rebels and knocked them out of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_1_После этого начался до:
After this, a long stage of recovery began.\.
Everything that was destroyed was repaired.
All buildings, defensive systems, mechanisms\..\..\..
Everything is back to normal.
dialogs_chapter_1_Проверку боевых навыко:
I passed the combat skills test.
There's nothing more for me to do here.
dialogs_chapter_1_С тестом на умение при:
With a test for the ability to use consumables
I passed\..\..\.. We need to move on.
dialogs_chapter_1_Проверка мышления прой:
The mindset test has been passed.
It's time for the next test.
dialogs_chapter_1_Экзаменационная секция:
Exam section... It's too early to get here
go.
